NF.Q: In the column Attractions of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 7933? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
Between which pairs of nodes in column Hotels and column Spending Types is the flow between 3302 and 14721? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {4115} from node {Budget Hotel} to {Dining}, a flow of {14454} from node {Business Hotel} to {Tours}, a flow of {8283} from node {Resort} to {Dining}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 3084 and 3559? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Museum to node Boutique Hotel and from node Theme Park to node Budget Hotel, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Theme Park} to node {Budget Hotel} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Historical Site to node Boutique Hotel, from node Shopping District to node Resort, and from node Beach to node Boutique Hotel, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Shopping District} to node {Resort} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Attractions of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Hiking Trail to target node South America? Please list all node labels along this path.
